kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout that is used by various keywords.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=session, url=http://app-4pl-authentication.drivs.staging.tel.internal, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.

kw.name: Post Request
kw.doc: Send a POST request on the session object found using the given `alias`

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Validation Http status code success 200 OK
Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Get From Dictionary
kw.doc: Returns a value from the given ``dictionary`` based on the given ``key``.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.
